prop.name: validFrom
prop.desc: The date when the item becomes valid.

prop.name: validThrough
prop.desc: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

prop.name: opens
prop.desc: The opening hour of the place or service on the given day(s) of the week.

prop.name: closes
prop.desc: The closing hour of the place or service on the given day(s) of the week.

prop.name: dayOfWeek
prop.desc: The day of the week for which these opening hours are valid.
